65.eng-name: Prophetic Commentary on the Qur'an (Tafseer of the Prophet (pbuh))

hadiths.text: Narrated Qais bin Ubad:Abu Dharr used to take an oath confirming that the Verse: 'These two opponents (believers, and disbelievers) dispute with each other about their Lord.' (22.19) was Revealed in connection with Hamza and his two companions and `Utbah and his two companions on the day when they ease out of the battle of Badr

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِهِ {هَذَانِ خَصْمَانِ اخْتَصَمُوا فِي رَبِّهِمْ}
chapter.eng-name: The Statement of Allah the Exalted: "These two opponents (believers and disbelievers) dispute with each other about their Lord..." (V.22:19)
